thread.title: Of course Chelsea Peretti styled her own birth announcement after Beyoncé
thread.title_full: Of course Chelsea Peretti styled her own birth announcement after Beyoncé

author: Heather Dockray
title: Of course Chelsea Peretti styled her own birth announcement after Beyoncé
text:
Of course Chelsea Peretti styled her own birth announcement after Beyoncé 13 By Heather Dockray 2017-02-05 22:24:41 UTC 
There is no way you can overshadow a Beyoncé birth announcement — all you can do is pay respect. 
That's the lesson Chelsea Peretti thankfully learned when she made her own birth announcement on Saturday. Peretti, who is married to comedian Jordan Peele, announced their first child on Instagram. A photo posted by Chelsea Peretti (@chelsanity) on Feb 4, 2017 at 3:12pm PST Feb 4, 2017 at 3:09pm PST 
And just compare it to the original: A photo posted by Beyoncé (@beyonce) on Feb 1, 2017 at 10:39am PST 
Nothing screams Beyoncé like a beige sweater and a black purse, as Peretti knows so well. BONUS: One 'Pitch Perfect' actress writes songs for Rihanna and Beyoncé
